creator: pherweg@web.de
text:
Hi,

i have added some lines of code to four classes, in order to get the 
startTable, endTable, startCell, endCell, startColumn, endColumn, startRow and 
endRow events get triggered (for example in RTFHandler).

I need these events, because i am working on table support for rtf handler.

Before commiting attached patches please commit
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=23085
first.

Thanks
Peter
